entry.title: jaywcjlove/reference
entry.summary:
为开发人员分享快速参考备忘清单(速查表)

Quick Reference

为开发人员分享快速参考备忘清单【速查表】。这是英文版 Reference 的中文版本，目的是为了方便自己的技术栈查阅，如果您提供一个清单，我将抽空搬运，立即撸起来 :)。如果您发现此处的备忘单不合适，您可以通过提交 PR 来修复它或提供更好的备忘清单，只针对【中文】用户。以下是开源天使提供的一些备忘清单和快速参考 :)。

正在建设中...

坑已挖，需要您的参与完善和贡献！🙏

看到缺少什么了吗？

上面的列表没有看到你想要的？ 您是否正在寻找一些备忘清单或参考资料，或者您有一些片段备忘清单要分享，这是一个最好的机会！

请求添加备忘单(速查表) 我有一张备忘单(速查表)

感谢所有贡献者

请参阅 Quick Reference 了解如何开始。一如既往，感谢我们出色的贡献者！

贡献者列表，由 contributors 自动生成

国内镜像网站

由于中国国内访问，时常打不开，你可以访问下面镜像网站。推荐自己的镜像网站

quickref.cn ecdata.cn aibk.cn jgeek.cn laoleng.vip liujiapeng.com dbyun.net dc6.fun

如果你有资源，可以很方便部署 web 版，这非常简单，只需要克隆 gh-pages 分支代码到你的静态服务就可以了，还可以使用 docker 快捷部署 web 版。

entry.title: alexbelgium/hassio-addons
entry.summary:
My homeassistant addons

Home assistant add-on: alexbelgium

Thanks to everyone having starred my repo! To star it click on the image below, then it will be on top right. Thanks!

Thanks to all contributors !

About

Home Assistant allows anyone to create add-on repositories to share their add-ons for Home Assistant easily. This repository is one of those repositories, providing extra Home Assistant add-ons for your installation.

The primary goal of this project is to provide you (as a Home Assistant user) with additional, high quality, add-ons that allow you to take your automated home to the next level.

Installation

If you want to do add the repository manually, please follow the procedure highlighted in the Home Assistant website. Use the following URL to add this repository: https://github.com/alexbelgium/hassio-addons

Add-ons provided by this repository

✓ Arpspoof : block internet connection for local network devices

  

✓ Baikal : Baïkal is a Calendar+Contacts server

  

✓ Bazarr NAS : Companion application to Sonarr and Radarr to download subtitles

  

✓ Booksonic-air : platform for accessing the audibooks you own wherever you are

  

✓ Browserless Chrome : Chrome as a service container

  

✓ Calibre : e-book manager

  

✓ Calibre-web : browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing Calibre database

  

✓ Cloudcommander : Cloud Commander a file manager for the web with console and editor

  

✓ Code-server (VScode) : Code-server is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser.

  

✓ Elasticsearch server : Free and Open, Distributed, RESTful Search Engine

  

✓ Emby NAS : A Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media.

  

✓ Enedisgateway2mqtt : use Enedis Gateway API to send data in your MQTT Broker (latest channel)

  

✓ Enedisgateway2mqtt Dev : use Enedis Gateway API to send data in your MQTT Broker (latest-dev channel)

  

✓ Epic Games Free : Automatically login and redeem promotional free games from Epic Games Store

  

✓ Filebrowser : filebrowser provides a file managing interface within a specified directory and it can be used to upload, delete, preview, rename and edit your files

  

✓ Firefly iii : A free and open source personal finance manager

  

✓ Firefly iii Data Importer : Data importer for Firefly III (separate addon)

  

✓ Firefly iii FinTS Importer : Import financial transactions from your FinTS enabled bank into Firefly III

  

✓ FlareSolverr : Proxy server to bypass Cloudflare protection

  

✓ Flexget : FlexGet is a multipurpose automation tool for all of your media

  

✓ Gazpar2mqtt : fetch GRDF data and publish data to a mqtt broker

  

✓ Gitea : Gitea for Home Assistant

  

✓ Grav web server : Fast, Simple, and Flexible, file-based Web-platform

  

✓ Guacamole Client : Clientless remote desktop gateway

  

✓ Inadyn : Inadyn is a small and simple Dynamic DNS, DDNS, client with HTTPS support. A large number of dynamic dns providers are supported (https://github.com/troglobit/inadyn#supported-providers). For those that are not, you can use a custom provider as per this project's documentation (https://github.com/nalipaz/hassio-addons/blob/master/README.md)

  

✓ Jackett NAS : translates queries from apps (Sonarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc) into tracker-site-specific http queries, parses the html response, then sends results back to the requesting software

  

✓ Jellyfin NAS : A Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media.

  

✓ Joal : An open source command line RatioMaster with WebUI

  

✓ Joplin Server : Self-hosted open source note-taking application

  

✓ Lidarr NAS : Music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users

  

✓ Mealie : Mealie is a self hosted recipe manager and meal planner built in Vue

  

✓ Mylar3 : Automated comic book downloader for use with NZB and torrents

  

✓ Nextcloud : Nextcloud for Home Assistant

  

✓ Nzbget : usenet downloader

  

✓ Omada : TP-Link Omada Controller

  

✓ Omada v3.2 : TP-Link Omada Controller

  

✓ Ombi : Self-hosted Plex Request and user management system

  

✓ Organizr : An HTPC/Homelab services organizer that is written in PHP

  

✓ Overseerr : Request management and media discovery tool built to work with your existing Plex ecosystem

  

✓ Paperless NGX : scan, index and archive all your physical documents

  

✓ Papermerge : Open source document management system (DMS)

  

✓ Photoprism : A server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection

  

✓ Piwigo : Piwigo is a photo gallery software for the web

  

✓ Plex NAS : Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices.

  

✓ Plex meta manager : Python script to update metadata information for movies, shows, and collections as well as automatically build collections

  

✓ Portainer : Manage your Docker environment with ease

  

✓ Prowlarr NAS : Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers offering complete management ofSonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr indexers with no per app setup required

  

✓ Qbittorrent : qBittorrent is a bittorrent client

  

✓ Radarr NAS : A fork of Sonarr to work with movies like Couchpotato

  

✓ Readarr NAS : Book Manager and Automation

  

✓ Repository Updater : Automatic addons update by aligning version tag with upstream releases

  

✓ Requestrr : Chatbot used to simplify using services like Sonarr/Radarr/Ombi via the use of chat

  

✓ ResilioSync : Self-hosted file share and collaboration platform on the web

  

✓ Scrutiny : Scrutiny WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring

  

✓ Scrutiny (Full Access) : Scrutiny WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring (Full Access)

  

✓ Seafile : High performance file syncing and sharing, with also Markdown WYSIWYG editing, Wiki, file label and other knowledge management features

  

✓ Sonarr NAS : Can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them

  

✓ Spotweb : Spotweb is a decentralized usenet community based on the Spotnet protocol

  

✓ Tandoor recipes : recipe manager

  

✓ Tdarr : Distributed transcode automation using FFmpeg/HandBrake

  

✓ Teamspeak server : voice communication for online gaming, education and training

  

✓ Transmission : Bittorrent client based on linuxserver image

  

✓ Transmission Openvpn : Docker container running Transmission torrent client with WebUI over an OpenVPN tunnel

  

✓ Ubooquity : Free, lightweight, and easy-to-use home server for your comics and ebooks

  

✓ Unpackerr : Unpacks RARd files for Sonarr, Lidarr and Radarr

  

✓ Vaultwarden (Bitwarden) : Open source password management solution

  

✓ Webtop Alpine KDE : Full linux desktop environment accessible via any modern web browser

  

✓ Webtrees : web's leading on-line collaborative genealogy application

  

✓ Whoogle Search : Self-hosted, ad-free, privacy-respecting metasearch engine

  

✓ Xteve : M3U Proxy for Plex DVR and Emby Live TV

  

✓ Zoneminder : A full-featured, open source, state-of-the-art video surveillance software system

  

Support

Got questions?

You have several options to get them answered:

  • The Home Assistant Community Forum.
  • This repository issues list
